confirm_execute_command: Do you want to execute the command?
dashboard_description: Manage your servers and perform actions from a single place
cmd_backup_data_desc: Command /backup is used to backup TSplus data and settings.
cmd_restore_data_desc: Command /restore is used to restore TSplus data and settings from a backup.
cmd_update_desc: Command /update is used to update TSplus to the latest version.
cmd_windows_compatibility_desc: Command to apply Windows compatibility updates.
cmd_install_printer_desc: Command to install the TSplus Universal Printer.
cmd_remove_printer_desc: Command to remove the TSplus Universal Printer.
cmd_proxy_set_desc: Command to configure the proxy server for TSplus.
cmd_web_credentials_desc: Command to open the Web Credentials form.
cmd_web_credentials_add_desc: Command to add new Web Credentials.
cmd_session_manager_desc: Command to open the Session Manager.
cmd_farm_sessions_monitor_desc: Command to open the Farm Sessions Monitor.
cmd_farm_loadbalancing_desc: Command to open the Load Balancing Manager.
cmd_system_audit_desc: Command to run a system audit.
cmd_activate_license_desc: Command to activate a TSplus license.
cmd_license_reset_desc: Command to reset the TSplus license after VM cloning.
cmd_vl_activate_desc: Command to activate a Volume License.
cmd_vl_enable_desc: Command to enable a Volume License.
cmd_vl_disable_desc: Command to disable a Volume License.
cmd_vl_update_desc: Command to update a Volume License.
cmd_vl_credits_license_desc: Command to display remaining license credits for a Volume License key.
cmd_vl_credits_support_desc: Command to display remaining support credits for a Volume License key.
cmd_2fa_getusers_desc: Command to list users registered for 2FA.
cmd_2fa_deleteuser_desc: Command to delete a user or group from 2FA.
cmd_windowscredential_addorupdate_desc: Command to add or update credentials in the Windows Credentials Manager.
cmd_windowscredential_remove_desc: Command to remove credentials from the Windows Credentials Manager.
action_panel_invalid_path: The path parameter is not valid.
terminal_description: Interactive terminal for command output and logs
